title: SCP-Y7CR4-EX - [AUTHOR PAGE LOADED]
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]] [[include :scp-wiki:theme:aesthetic-theme]] [[>]] [[module rate]] [[/>]] [[size 500%]]Hi![[/size]] Welcome to my little author page, my name is [[*user R4_EX]](they/them) and I'm a writer here on the wiki! Not sure what you're doing here but feel free to have a look around, learn a bit about me and maybe even read one or two of my things. @@ @@ [[tabview]] [[tab About Me]] I'm a kid from the South of England who enjoys playing piano and singing classical music in choirs. I'm very nerdy and really like d&d, Magic: The Gathering and anime[[footnote]]Surprise surprise, the scp author is a massive nerd.[[/footnote]]. I feel like I'm a pretty down to Earth guy who likes to write things that some people enjoy. I got into scp over lockdown after hearing about it from some friends at school. After I realised it was a creative writing site I decided to give it a shot and joined. This is my first time being so invested in an internet community and I'm glad that everyone here that I've interacted with has been nice and/or helpful wherever I go. I'm usually active on the scpd discord (my account is R4_EX#0842) Some of you may not know much about me, or never seen me before in your life. But I'll let you know right here and now that I'm always willing to talk about pretty much any topic. I love hearing about the things that other people really like and are passionate about, it never fails to interest me so shoot me a message if you ever want to talk. Anyway, I'm not just here to make friends[[footnote]]I'm mainly here to make friends[[/footnote]], I also write. You can look at some of that stuff on the next tab! [[/tab]] [[tab My Works]] [[include :scp-wiki:component:author-page order=created_at]] [[size 200%]]**__Collabs:__**[[/size]] [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7k-j|SCP-7k-J]]] by Elenee, Dodo, Fishish, GremlinGroup, Lord, me and Stormbreath @@ @@ [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-bathrooms-wiki|The Bathrooms Wiki]]] by 18 People on April Fools @@ @@ [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rate-my-director|Rate My Director]]] by 30 People on April Fools [[/tab]] [[tab Opinions on R4_EX]] But what do others have to say about me? Let's find out! Are they looking at me right now? ðŸ˜³"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user Cole 13]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"Iâ€™ve never read their stuff knowingly but their discord pfp is a giraffe and thatâ€™s neat"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user LizardWizard]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"R4-Ex? I miss them so much please give me my sweaters back"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user Pedagon]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"R4-"EX"? Idk, their writing seems pretty anomalous still"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user Dr Moned]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"the r4_ex, the myth, the giraffe legend"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user JakDragonX]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"R4_EX is too tall"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user Totallynotenby]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"The best author on site, perfect in every way and probably extremely attractive"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user R4_EX]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"Please help me, I am trapped on this webpage in constant agony"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user Stoner99]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[div style="float: center; display: block; padding: 10px 10px 10px 10px; background: none; border: 5px double black; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; margin-bottom: 30px; font-size: 110%; text-align: center;"]] [[size 140%]]//"Bababooey"//[[/size]] [[div style="border-bottom: 3px double black;"]] [[/div]] -- [[*user PlaguePJP]] @@ @@ [[/div]] [[/tab]] [[tab Cool Giraffe FactsðŸ˜Ž]] @@ @@ Giraffes are usually tall. @@ @@ Send //your// cool giraffe facts[[footnote]]ðŸ˜Ž[[/footnote]] to [[*user R4_EX]] to be featured. @@ @@ "that giraffe is so silly! so so so sos os so sos so so so so" -[[*user J Dune]] @@ @@ [[html]]
[[/html]] -[[*user Elenee FishTruck]] @@ @@ @@ @@ "gerrafe" -[[*user TStaffor]] [[/tab]] [[/tabview]] @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ [[=]] [[size 200%]]__Badges:__ [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Orange.png]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/TV.png]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/1K.jpg]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Purple.png]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-achievement-badges/Cycle.jpg]][[/size]] [[/=]] @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ While I have no intentions of doing so, if I go missing for 6 or more months I give all my works to [[*user Ralliston]] to do with as they please. But for now I doubt that is going to happen, so I will keep writing, reading and talking to the amazing people on this site. That's all from me for now. I hope you all enjoyed learning a little more about me. Make sure you all stay safe and stay your amazing selves. [[size 500%]]Bye![[/size]]
author: R4_EX
